title: Covering SQL Server 2005 and 2008
description:
Effective data modeling is essential to ensuring that your databases will perform well, scale well, and evolve to meet changing requirements. However, if youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re modeling databases to run on Microsoft SQL Server 2008 or 2005, theoretical or platform-agnostic data modeling knowledge isnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t enough: models that donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t reflect SQL ServerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s unique real-world strengths and weaknesses often lead to disastrous performance.

A DeveloperÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Guide to Data Modeling for SQL Server is a practical, SQL Server-specific guide to data modeling for every developer, architect, and administrator.
